original_table_html:

  • Cares more about people than money

  • Treats patients with rare complex illnesses
summary_markdown: This table outlines perceptions of Mayo Clinic, categorized by attributes related to patient care, medical expertise, and institutional reputation. Key themes include a strong emphasis on patient well-being, with statements like "Can be trusted to do what’s right for patients" and "Cares more about people than money." The institution is perceived as having highly skilled medical professionals, evidenced by phrases such as "Doctors work as a team," "Best doctors in the world," and "Can figure out what’s wrong when other doctors can’t." Furthermore, Mayo Clinic is recognized for its leadership in medical research and treatment, highlighted by "Leader in medical research," "World leader in new medical treatments," and specific mentions of cancer research and treating complex illnesses. The table also touches upon its global recognition ("Known worldwide") and advanced resources ("Latest medical equipment and technology"). The overall structure presents a multifaceted view of Mayo Clinic's strengths and public image.
